performances.description: More of a raw version, but it still has all those good ol' stompin' elements.
Vintage Grateful Dead Blues, Killer version of the rarely played little gem Jerry is sparkling
A fantastic version... Jerry's voice is young and bluesy, Bob contributes some mighty fine vocals, Jerry's rootsy solos... but Pig's harp? BLUES, BABY

performances.venue: RCA Victor Studio A Hollywood, CA
performances.description: Studio Outtake. From The Golden Road
